nodes.text: Requiem Squadron was an experimental New Republic TIE Defender starfighters group led by Wedge Antilles, as part of Ysanne Isard's plans to infiltrate Ciutric IV and defeat the Imperial Warlord known as Prince-Admiral Delak Krennel. The squadron was composed by the surviving pilots of the famous Rogue Squadron, and were piloting TIE Defenders supplied by Colonel Broak Vessery following their "deaths" at the Battle of Distna.
